job description:
No sponsorship available. No third-party candidates.

With over two decades of marketplace success, our privately owned client is a global leader in the development and manufacturing of top-grade advanced energy systems. Although this client maintains headquarters in the local Austin area, they have expanded operations in recent years to include internationally-distributed locations, including facilities in China and Ireland.

As this client continues their expansion in the Austin area, they're looking to bring on an experienced Applications Engineer to join one of organization's most paramount teams tasked with revolutionizing the development of the company’s unique product offerings.

What you get to do:

  • Take ownership of all technical liaisons for clients' energy storage projects, including introductions, specifications, integrations, and support
  • Play an integral role in developing the company's next generation of solutions through the collection of data during your daily interactions with customers as well as your robust market and industry insights
  • Use the data you've collected to develop technical requirements and roadmaps
  • Create a healthy rapport with the company's globally distributed senior technology management teams

What you need to succeed:

  • 3+ years of experience as an applications engineer performing hands-on work with both control and power systems (C# or C++)
  • Proven ability to deliver technical requirements and roadmaps based on marketplace, industry, and client data
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills

What’s in it for you:

This position is a great opportunity to get your foot in the door with an outstanding company located in gorgeous Austin, Texas! With strong compensation packages, top-of-the-line benefits, and a fun, relaxed work environment, it's easy to see why our client continues to attract and retain top technical talent. If you're interested in joining a stable company that's working diligently to create the next generation of energy storage solutions that will be used all over the world, look no further!

Apply today to get the ball rolling on your next big career move!
